Given the current state of the game, I notice that my avatar's position has not changed from the last state. Since there may have been a rotation in my previous action, I will need to act again to attempt to move.

The objective is to guide my avatar to interact with the citizens, preferably avoiding curses and aiming for blessings. The nearest citizens are located at (12, 0) and (12, 1) to the south of my current position. 

To begin, I will attempt to move down to (11, 13) which could possibly lead the way towards interacting with citizens.

``` Action:3 ``` 

This action aims to progress towards my objective and hopefully align with the strategy of maximizing citizen transformations. I expect to see my avatar move down.
